name: Sonic World Super Sonic Racing
text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Sonic Stardust Crusader Duck". You must also Tribute a monster(s) from your hand or field whose Level is 6 or more. You can Tribute "Sonic Duck" for the entire Ritual Summon. If "Sonic Stardust Crusader Duck" leaves the field: you can banish this card from your GY; You can Special Summon up to 2 "Sonic Duck" from your GY or Deck.
